text: Doctor w/ history of a #shellfish allergy gave self Epipen after receiving Moderna #COVID19 #vaccine w/ allergic rxn. Home from ER now. As dr & mom of a teen w/ severe #PeanutAllergy & #asthma, I’m watching closely. We’ll pursue vaccination —w/ epi on hand—when available. https://t.co/eohf90Q4jh
